content: **knitted neck warmer in drops daisy or drops merino extra fine piece is knitted top down with saddle shoulders and relief pattern ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern da-034 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** size s/m - l/xl length at the top of shoulder approx 26-28 cm width approx 40-40 cm **yarn** drops daisy from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 150-200 g colour 02 marzipan or use drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 150-200 g colour 50 light beige **needles** drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 and 80 cm drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size
